title: Extra Smoke: Jamal Crawford | Lob City Clippers, State Of NBA, Retirement | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Extra Smoke: Jamal Crawford | Lob City Clippers, State Of NBA, Retirement | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
On a special episode of ALL THE SMOKE, Jamal Crawford chops it up with Matt and Stak. The boys discuss Crawford's retirement, the lob city Clippers missing out on the finals, and the current NBA playoffs run. Plus, he discusses the state of the league, the lack of vets in the NBA, and his favorite current players. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
